name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cigar Price History and Free Fall Tracker

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Historical pricing displayed right on the page for the product you are currently viewing - includes the best Free Fall price tracker

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bid on cigars with confidence from Cigar Bid, Cigar Monster, and Cigar Auctioneer.  This  extension automatically displays historical prices of the product you are currently viewing right on the page. It also includes a Cigar Bid Free Fall tracker. This feature improves upon others that are available by permanently remembering the lowest price you have ever seen for a specific product during a free fall auction.  When you navigate away, refresh, or just happen to come across the same product being offered again as a free fall auction, this extension will show you the lowest free fall price you have ever seen, as well as the lowest price for your current viewing session.
